Trial_Design.evidence: This open-label, single-arm, phase 2 trial conducted at 5 transplant centers

Intervention.evidence: evaluated the ability of imlifidase to create a negative crossmatch test within 24 h

Method_Outcome.evidence: evaluated the ability of imlifidase to create a negative crossmatch test within 24 h

Result_Outcome.evidence: 89.5% demonstrated conversion of baseline positive crossmatch to negative within 24 h after imlifidase treatment

Harms.evidence: Seven adverse events in 6 patients were classified as possibly or probably related to treatment and were mild-moderate in severity
